snippet.title: The Sims Social Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Visit the fan page her: http://on.fb.me/ijBY4X The Sims Social will soon bring the fun and creativity of The Sims to Facebook! Create unique Sims and live out their dreams—or stir up trouble by pulling pranks. Develop deep relationships to unlock new features and advance: befriend and fight, date and cheat, love and betray. Play with life in a whole new way—with your real friends, for free!
